quote: Fashion is about two things: the evolution and the opposite.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: Fashion is a language that creates itself in clothes to interpret reality.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: I am a fashion person, and fashion is not only about clothes -- it's about all kinds of change
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: Like poetry, fashion does not state anything. It merely suggests
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: Fashion is a form of ugliness so intolerable that we have to alter it every six months.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Fashion is only the attempt to realize art in living forms and social intercourse.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Art is subject to arbitrary fashion.
author: Kary Mullis

quote: Fashion is about going ahead, not about memory.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: A fit, healthy body—that is the best fashion statement
author: Jess C. Scott

quote: I would like to be a one-man multinational fashion phenomenon.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: Fashion does not have to prove that it is serious. It is the proof that intelligent frivolity can be something creative and positive
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: Fashion [10w] Clothes makes the man.Fashion, above all, makes the President.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: I think it's difficult to do fashion for men, because either you become very over-homosexual fashion or very boring fashion. You don't want a boy who looks 15 in a little pair of shorts with some strange art... But to see just a jacket and tie is boring.
author: Carine Roitfeld

quote: Fashion and music are the same, because music express its period too.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: I want everyone to wear what they want and mix it in their own way. That, to me, is what is modern.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: Happiness and confidence are the prettiest things you can wear
author: Taylor Swift

quote: Words are the clothes thoughts wear.
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: If I wasn't even famous or had any success, I would still wake up and put tons of make-up on, and put on a cool outfit. That's always been who I've been my whole life, so that's never gonna change. I love fashion. I love getting dressed up. I love Halloween, too.
author: Gwen Stefani

quote: Art produces ugly things which frequently become more beautiful with time. Fashion, on the other hand, produces beautiful things which always become ugly with time.
author: Jean Cocteau

quote: There is a lack of humor in fashion. To me, it's always been the fun, cool industry to work in, and I always wanted people to be on my side and see how much fun we really have behind the scenes.
author: Chris Benz

quote: Today we’re living in an anti-Waldo world, where you don’t want to blend in and have people struggle to find you. You want your personal brand to stand out like you’re wearing a red and white sweater, and everyone else has on black.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: To do a dull thing with style-now that's what I call art.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: Beware of all enterprises that require new clothes.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: When art dresses in worn-out material it is most easily recognized as art.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Logos on designer clothes don't make me feel like I've got a strong personal brand. No clothes make the man. Even wearing no clothes I'm still me.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Luxury is the ease of a t-shirt in a very expensive dress.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: I want my wardrobe to be full of good clothes, so that when I'm deciding what to wear, I don't run out of options. I love shopping!
author: Virat Kohli

quote: I love to design. I am a commercial fashion designer. I always design jackets with two sleeves. I don't design jackets with three sleeves, or the layers and layers come off like little dolls from Russia. Fashion for me is a creative endeavor, but it is not art for me.
author: Tom Ford

quote: I love dressing up. It's the best part of being a girl, I think.
author: Emma Roberts

quote: I hope people will say, 'Mr. Valentino, he did something for fashion, no?'
author: Valentino Garavani

quote: If you are out to describe the truth, leave elegance to the tailor.
author: Ludwig Boltzmann

quote: The leading cause of death among fashion models is falling through street grates.
author: Dave Barry

quote: What's with what you're wearing?"Griggs asks while we stand outside waiting for the others."It's pretty hideous, isn't it?"I say."Don't force me to look at it,"he says. "It's see-through."That kills conversation for a couple of seconds.
author: Melina Marchetta,  On the Jellicoe Road

quote: America, you're sending girls a mixed message. On one hand, you're saying to have positive body image and love who we are; on the other, we're being marketed makeup and clothing that obviously turns us into someone different.
author: Adora Svitak

quote: People don't care what I wear or don't wear, and even if I don't wear anything people will cover for me if they know that I care about them.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: I love people who dress how they feel and change it depending on the day.
author: Becky G

quote: What do I wear in bed? Why, Chanel No. 5, of course
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Femininity is not just lipstick, stylish hairdos, and trendy clothes. It is the divine adornment of humanity. It finds expression in your qualities of your capacity to love, your spirituality, delicacy, radiance, sensitivity, creativity, charm, graciousness, gentleness, dignity, and quiet strength.
author: James E. Faust

quote: We are really living the American dream, to be a successful brand in the States and in Europe and to steep ourselves in our heritage. But we do it with a sense of humor. We don't take ourselves too seriously in fashion.
author: Tommy Hilfiger

quote: You can never be overdressed or overeducated.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Clothes make the man. Naked people have little or no influence on society.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Create your own style… let it be unique for yourself and yet identifiable for others.
author: Anna Wintour

quote: Lingerie is my next love after clothing; I think it is what is worn underneath that really inspires a woman to feel beautiful in her clothes - that inner, secret glamour.
author: Alice Temperley

quote: There is one other reason for dressing well, namely that dogs respect it, and will not attack you in good clothes.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: It's just that in the Deep South, women learn at a young age that when the world is falling apart around you, it's time to take down the drapes and make a new dress.
author: Karen Marie Moning,  Faefever

quote: Those guys who want to have the Mohawk...which, to me, is the new business casual.
author: Gerard Way

quote: You know, lieutenant, you wear your weapon the way other women wear pearls.""It's not a fashion accessory.
author: J.D. Robb,  Naked in Death

quote: Nice dress. Take it off.
author: Janet Evanovich

quote: The only rule is don't be boring and dress cute wherever you go. Life is too short to blend in.
author: Paris Hilton

quote: What you have to understand is that my thing is not glamour. I love stretch marks and C-section scars and all of that. I'm a grown man. You don't gotta put on no makeup with me.
author: Tracy Morgan
